FAQ / Wave 5 / Stratagems /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Sabotage

  1. What does "being upgraded" mean on Gearsâ€™ stratagem Sabotage? [Source: Aequitas]
    Being upgraded covers any time an upgrade is Put on a character (including Playing, Moving, and Swapping). It does not cover when an upgrade remains on a character during combining.
  2. Why is there a Decepticon symbol on Gear's stratagem? [Source: Aequitas]
    In the 1985 Changing Gears episode of the G1 cartoon, Gears has a circuit removed and becomes a happy to please mechanoid who will help anyone, including the Decepticons. The symbol on the stratagem is stated to be a tongue in cheek reference to that episode.
